name: TRAP (itch) (Gimhan)
description:
Its a trap,

So welcome to the page guys this is my first video game and I made this without any game engine.I used python pygame ?module to made this thing.leave comment If there any bugs on this game or you need to update this game to a next level .So enjoy the game.

How to play:

When you click start.. The player spawn inside the hall. then, press arrow keys to control the player .

  • click on the Q icon to quit 
  • click on 2nd icon to turn off sounds(after updates)
  • click on 3rd icon to restart the game.
